title: Don't Miss This Gorgeous Home! Apply Now!
posting_body: One Bedroom, One Bathroom with bonus den space available now!
Don't miss out on this One Bedroom, One Bathroom unit with a bonus den available now!
This unit features an open and bright floorplan with a spacious living room & large master bedroom.
Updated, bright, and beautiful bathroom includes stand in shower.
The kitchen offers plenty of countertop and cabinet space with a gas range/oven and double basin sink.
Bonus den room creates possibilities of home office space, storage, or more!
Shared driveway offers off street parking for residents at no additional cost.
Shared storage room with other units in this property.
Located near Highland Hospital and easily accessible to the popular Glenview district that boasts restaurants, coffee shops, and local stores.
Easy on/off access to freeway, close to public transportation.
This home is professionally managed by Hopyard Property Management.
All our properties are professionally cleaned and undergo a thorough inspection prior to any move-in.
At any time, you are welcome to call us and speak with a live agent.
